fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm proxy endpoints remain deprecated
fields.request_details:
1. POST a signed /nodes/proxy/session/ payload from a trusted node and confirm the API responds 410 Gone without returning a login_url.
2. Attempt to redeem any prior proxy token against /nodes/proxy/login/<token>/ and confirm the response is 410.
3. POST a signed /nodes/proxy/execute/ payload and confirm the API responds 410 without executing the request.
